strings.Value: {n}The earth beneath your feet trembles. Something in its depths is moving, falling, clasping. Harrim walks out through the gates of the fortress, covered in stone dust from head to toe. As he comes to a halt, the ceiling behind him crumbles and falls.{/n} "It is done. Let us go."

{n}Harrim exits the dungeon without looking back. His face bears a strange expression â€“ a pensive half-smile.{/n} "You know, {Name}... I think I've just realized something. Something very, very important... But I need to ponder it further. Let's talk about this later, after we return to the capital."

{n}Harrim looks at the sky pensively. His voice is unusually quiet.{/n} "I've just realized something, {Name}. Something very important. But I need to ponder it further. Let's talk about this later, after we return to the capital."
